short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TLDR: Multi-purpose URL scheduler + reminder extension. Schedule [insert website] urls to open exactly on time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A multi-purpose reminder extension.

It can be used to open URLs at scheduled times so you never miss a meeting, or stream, or other time sensitive web accessible event.

Features
- Dark / Light mode
- Open any URL at scheduled time
- Schedule reminder without URL for standard notification
- Weekly Recurring Flag
